attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to ask the Sports Minister, RH James Purnell MP, to intervene with the RFL after Castleford Tigers were unfairly relegated due to Wigan Warriors’ breach of the salary cap in the 2006 season, in order to ensure that Castleford Tigers get full monetary compensation, and/or other siutable compensatory packages, for the financial loss it suffered as a result of their relegation to National League One.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to ask the Sports Minister, RH James Purnell MP, to intervene with the RFL after Castleford Tigers were unfairly relegated due to Wigan Warriors’ breach of the salary cap in the 2006 season, in order to ensure that Castleford Tigers get full monetary compensation, and/or other siutable compensatory packages, for the financial loss it suffered as a result of their relegation to National League One."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12996.asp

Prime Minister's Office
